decoworld.model.world

Interface HasBounty

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BanditMob, Player, SherrifMob

    public interface HasBounty
    Objects that have a bounty assigned to them should implement this interface

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void iGotHim(int Bounty)
      The reward for killing a HasBounty object
      void iveBeenCaught()
      If a player, send to jail
      int priceOnHead()
      Represents the 'money' offered as a reward for capturing this object.

    • Method Detail

      • priceOnHead

        int priceOnHead()
        Represents the 'money' offered as a reward for capturing this object. Never lower than zero, nor a non-integer.
        Returns:
        The reward for capturing the object
